item.description: 1. Fourier series coefficients for Continuous signal> 1. Fourier series coefficients for Continuous signal # Asking deriving coefficients comes with periodic signal.: \(x(t) \rightarrow a_k\) 1.1 (CT FS) Basic concept of continuous Fourier coefficients> 1.
